import {Component, Inject} from "@angular/core"; import {MAT_DIALOG_DATA} from "@angular/material/dialog"; import {Blog} from "../../../interfaces/blog.interface"; @Component({ selector: 'app-blog-modal', templateUrl: "./blogModal.component.html" }) export class BlogModalComponent { blog: Blog constructor(@Inject(MAT_DIALOG_DATA) public data: any) { this.blog = data console.log(data) } }
